Extbase\Validation\Validator

Class Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_DisjunctionValidator

Extbase\Validation\Validator\Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_AbstractCompositeValidator
Extbase\Validation\Validator\Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_DisjunctionValidator

All Implemented Interfaces:

Countable, Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_ValidatorInterface
public class Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_DisjunctionValidator
extends Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_AbstractCompositeValidator

Validator to chain many validators in a disjunction (logical or). So only one validator has to be valid, to make the whole disjunction valid. Errors are only returned if all validators failed.

Package: Extbase
Subpackage: Validation\Validator
Version: $Id: ConjunctionValidator.php 2203 2009-05-12 18:44:47Z networkteam_hlubek $
